gpack 0.0.1
  • Reference

Get the ISO-2 code of G**gle Scholar languages

Source: R/get-languages.R
get_languages.Rd

Returns names and ISO-2 codes for 43 World languages supported by Scholar. User can search for specific patterns (see examples below).

get_languages(pattern = NULL)

Arguments

pattern

a character of length 1. A regular expression to be matched (optional).

Value

A 2-column data.frame with:

  • language: the language name

  • iso_2: the ISO-2 code

Examples

get_languages()
#>               language iso_2
#> 1               Arabic    ar
#> 2             Armenian    hy
#> 3           Belarusian    be
#> 4            Bulgarian    bg
#> 5              Catalan    ca
#> 6             Croatian    hr
#> 7                Czech    cs
#> 8               Danish    da
#> 9                Dutch    nl
#> 10             English    en
#> 11           Esperanto    eo
#> 12            Estonian    et
#> 13            Filipino    tl
#> 14             Finnish    fi
#> 15              French    fr
#> 16              German    de
#> 17               Greek    el
#> 18              Hebrew    iw
#> 19           Hungarian    hu
#> 20           Icelandic    is
#> 21          Indonesian    id
#> 22             Italian    it
#> 23            Japanese    ja
#> 24              Korean    ko
#> 25             Latvian    lv
#> 26          Lithuanian    lt
#> 27           Norwegian    no
#> 28             Persian    fa
#> 29              Polish    pl
#> 30          Portuguese    pt
#> 31            Romanian    ro
#> 32             Russian    ru
#> 33             Serbian    sr
#> 34              Slovak    sk
#> 35           Slovenian    sl
#> 36             Spanish    es
#> 37             Swedish    sv
#> 38                Thai    th
#> 39             Turkish    tr
#> 40           Ukrainian    uk
#> 41          Vietnamese    vi
#> 42  Chinese Simplified zh-CN
#> 43 Chinese Traditional zh-TW
get_languages(pattern = "^Sp")
#>   language iso_2
#> 1  Spanish    es
